sentence.Network_en: He was punctilious about being ready and waiting in the entrance hall exactly on time.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一丝不苟地作好准备并准时地在门厅等候。

sentence.Network_en: The more unpopular an opinion is, the more necessary is it that the holder should be somewhat punctilious in his observance of conventionalities generally.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个观点越不受欢迎, 这个观点的持有者越应谨小慎微地观察习俗惯例.

sentence.Network_en: He was a punctilious young man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个非常拘礼的年轻人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... punch line n. （笑话的）妙语 punctilious adj. 精密细心的,一丝不苟的 pungent adj. 辛辣的，刺激性的，严厉的.
蓝宝词典 ... punch line n. （笑话的）妙语 punctilious adj. 精密细心的,一丝不苟的 pungent adj. 辛辣的，刺激性的，严厉的.
SAT Official Guide V-Mate ... rancorous 深恨的, 怀恶意的 punctilious 拘泥细节的, 刻板的 myopic 近视的,缺乏远见的.
关于词汇记忆 - 英语 -... ... point,punct 点，变尖 punctilious a. 精密细心的，一丝不苟的，拘泥形式的 puncture v. 穿孔，刺穿.

list.abs: 翻译成英语_百度知道 ... 美剧 American Drama 不拘小节 not be punctilious 豪爽 expansive.
However , Badigin is very precise and punctilious person . Just seven kills ., 巴季金是一个非常精确和一丝不苟的人.
Devout Moslems oBserve Ramadan punctiliously ., 虔诚的穆斯林准时地遵守斋月.
拘泥... ... stick to the letter 拘泥文字 be very punctilious;scrupulous about minor details;stand on points 拘泥于细节.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French pointilleux, from pointille, from Italian puntiglio (see punctilio)

entry.tran: 一丝不苟的；循规蹈矩的
entry.def: Someone who is punctilious is very careful to behave correctly.

example.ex: He was punctilious about being ready and waiting in the entrance hall exactly on time...
example.tran: 他一丝不苟地作好准备并准时地在门厅等候。

example.ex: He was a punctilious young man.
example.tran: 他是个非常拘礼的年轻人。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by precise accordance with details;

sentences.sentence: "punctilious in his attention to rules of etiquette"

auth_sentence.content: It also had something neat and punctilious about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: It also had something neat and punctilious about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It also had something neat and punctilious about it.

auth_sentence.content: The stylish dresser, punctilious about his clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content: The stylish dresser, punctilious about his clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The stylish dresser, punctilious about his clothes.

auth_sentence.content: A punctilious and generous observer of birthdays.
auth_sentence.res_content: A punctilious and generous observer of birthdays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A punctilious and generous observer of birthdays.

stems_affixes.word_buile: punct点,变尖,指,针+ilious→[做事]点滴不漏→小心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严守时刻的,准时的,正点的
stems_affixes.word_buile: punct点,变尖,指,针+ual……的→到点上→准点的
pung=punct点,变尖,指,针+ent……的→尖的→尖锐的
acu尖+punct点+ure表名词→用尖[针]点→针炙
com全部+punct点,变尖,指,针+ion表名词→全身像针刺一样→懊悔
punctual[adj.严守时刻的,准时的,正点的]+ity表名词→n.准时
punctuate[v.加标点于;不时打断]+ion表名词→punctuation标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿
punct点,变尖,指,针+uate=ate表动词→加上点→加标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿

means.word_mean: 谨小慎微的,拘泥形式的

sentences.en: The more unpopular an opinion is, the more necessary is it that the holder should be somewhat punctilious in his observance of conventionalities generally.
sentences.cn: 一个观点越不受欢迎，这个观点的持有者越应谨小慎微地观察习俗惯例。
